sharingInfo.facebookTitle: Show us your Mix & Match style!
sharingInfo.facebookDescription: Spring is here! Stay motivated in the new adidas Women Training Collection!

tr.td: Show us how you Mix & Match in your adidas - tag #mixandmatch #adidaswomen @adidaswomen on Instagram
Stay motivated this Spring with our new adidas Women Training Collection - perfect for Mix & Matching
Check us out on Facebook.com/adidaswomen and Instagram.com/adidaswomen

text.p: The secret weapon in making and, more importantly, keeping New Year's resolutions is commitment. You set the goal (“I will beat my best time” or “I will wake up earlier to train harder”) and then you work towards it, little by little. It takes time and effort, but reaching that goal is a whole lot easier (and more fun) when you equip yourself with the best gear.

From shoes to apparel, accessories to equipment, options are endless when it comes to mixing and matching adidas Women’s Training gear. Stay motivated to stick to a new sport or reach another goal by shopping the new adidas Training range.

What do our girls love from the new adidas Women Training? Available in multiple colors for mixing and matching. The essentials to keep your gym bag full and you inspired: Our adiPure trainers, Prime tees & hoodies, the unbelievably comfortable TechFit ¾ pants, Marathon shorts, and the SN Racer bra.
The styles are fresh and the technologies speak for themselves. Pick these up and feel the difference for yourself. Two of our favorites:

adiPRENE: Heel-cushioning technology helps reduce the harmful repetitive effects from continuous impact while running or performing other activities. The adiPRENE technology provides optimal cushioning and support at the moment of impact but also absorbs the shock of impact by dispersing that energy throughout the body.
adidas ClimaCool: Keep cool and comfortable while performing at your peak, even in the hottest conditions. ClimaCool actively expels heat and sweat away from your body - how cool is that?

sharingInfo.facebookDescription: NEO’s latest styles go neatly organized to bring these awesome new outfits to life.
sharingInfo.twitterDescription: Check out our favorite NEO styles getting Neatly Organized (link) #liveyourstyle

text.p: Got your Fall and Winter wardrobe all laid out? If not, NEO can help.

At a recent photo shoot, NEO’s latest styles starred in a series of animated gifs that bring these awesome new outfits to life. Inspired by the “things organized neatly” trend in photography, each of the gifs introduces one NEO item at a time, tidily laid out on a wooden pallet. Using lo-fi stopmotion animation, the whole color-coded outfit appears within seconds and then dances around the pallet. We organized these NEO ensembles to inspire your attire all through the holidays — with outfits for Christmas, New Year’s Eve, and Valentine’s Day.
So take a look at the stills from the shoot or head here for the animated versions and watch the latest NEO styles come alive!

sharingInfo.facebookDescription: Boost is a groundbreaking innovation in cushioning. Find out more.
sharingInfo.twitterDescription: Boost is a groundbreaking innovation in cushioning. Find out more.

text.p: BOOST is a groundbreaking innovation in cushioning. It provides more energy return than any other foam cushioning material in the running industry, combining soft comfort with responsive energy for the ultimate running experience. In the heat, in the cold and after countless kilometers, it performs more consistently and doesn’t lose its cushioning properties like standard EVA.
#boost
Find out more: http://www.adidas.com/boost
Join the conversation: http://www.facebook.com/adidasrunning

sharingInfo.facebookDescription: BOOST provides more energy return than any other foam cushioning material in the running industry. BOOST your run.
sharingInfo.twitterDescription: BOOST provides more energy return than any other foam cushioning material in the running industry. BOOST your run. #boost

text.p: BOOST provides more energy return than any other foam cushioning material in the running industry. It combines soft comfort with responsive energy for the ultimate running experience. BOOST your run.

articleInfo.articleTitle: adidas Originals | all in with Undenk

sharingInfo.facebookTitle: adidas Originals | all in with Undenk
sharingInfo.facebookDescription: Introducing, Undenk, a new Berlin-based art collective. Check out the story of Undenk's art and how Berlin's history inspires their work.
sharingInfo.twitterDescription: Berlin & street art mixed with a healthy dose of cynicism and creative free will. adidas and VICE meet Undenk.

text.p: Meet Undenk, one of the most original street art collectives in the world.

Everyone knows Berlin has more street art than pretty much any other city in the world, so meet Undenk, one of the groups at the scene's forefront. Its ten members are putting up some of of the most forward-thinking work around.

In Part 1, we go to Berlin to catch up with three of Undenk's core members - Matthias Povel, and Lukas and Paul Kampfmann. We chat with Berlin street dons Pisa 73 and Christian Rothenhagen to learn how Undenk are perceived by their contemporaries.

Check out more from Undenk in Part 2 of the series, when we head out in the early morning hours to make street art, Undenk-style. We learn more about the crews' careers and join them on a Berlin rooftop, as they sticker and drop knowledge on the future of street art.
